Text.val: Author: Jerry Janssens
Creation date: 05.06.2002
06.08.2014 AS SCR#18653 added parameter pi.IsDirectory(False) to GB333 call
27.05.2014 AS SCR#18931 changed verify operation to warning in case of application server (Creditview)
15.08.2013 SH SCR18308 Update pi:From with INIGet ('[FLMAIL]POSTMASTER if pi.From is empty
07.02.2013 AS SCR#17942 Zipping large attachments before sending
23.08.2012 SH SCR17384 Removed IniPut(MailCharSet) = 'UTF-8' (it's always defined in ini)
15.06.2012 SH SCR17384 Changed all apha fields to Unicode
12.06.2012 AS SCR17337 using utf-8 for character set of mail and converting unicode parameters to codepage 65001 (utf-8)
01.06.2012 GB SCR17337 New version of the GM102. Changed format the parameters pi.Subject, pi.Message to unicode
10.11.2010 SH SCR15968 Added test GSET_YESNO(348) <> 'Y' to turn job to MSGW
in case of any error
09.08.2010 SH SCR15696 Changed test to tun job to MSGW in case of email error
only if [MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]ENVIRONMENT = P (production)
06.11.2004 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
09.11.2004 JJ SCR6925 no MSGW for test environment (logical name)
LB 27.11.2003 Verify statment with MOD=Error aborts the task before #GB722 is
called. I changed the MOD to Warning when it runs on AS/400.
20.11.2003 JJ fixed arguments MAILCONNECT
17.06.2003 JJ removed outdated return code info comments from RM
08-JUN-2003 AS, intorduced [FLMAIL] section in .ini which contains all mail
relevant information
07.05.2003 JJ fixed skip of host feature check when using pi.SMTP_HOST
24.04.2003 AS, added additional parameters pi.SMTP_host, pi.SMTP_user,
pi.SMTP_password. if pi.SMTP_host is set (<>'') GM102 will take this server (
instead of looking it up from the .ini)
02.07.2002 JJ -Added optional resend of mail without attachment if sending with
attachment fails, returning po.ErrorCode >1000 if resend succeeds
- changed mail host addressing from Hostname to IP
(I don't know if mail works on the AS400 but this gives it a better chance)
... if sender email address is empty, possible if GM102 is submitted, update with
defined postmaster address from MAGIC400.INI (INIGet ('[FLMAIL]POSTMASTER') does not always
has a value in the client INII files)
read relevant information from .ini ...
check for non-optional .ini entries ...
error#1 SMTP server entry in .ini is missing
error#2 MaxAttachmentSize in .ini missing or invalid
retrieve a sequence number for the mail ...
error#3 cannot get sequence number for SMTP mail
zip large attachments before actually sending them....
zip worked, replace original attachment with it ...
check attachment size/existence ....
error#5 invalid attachment path
error#6 invalid attachment size
convert subject and message body from Unicode to UTF-8 ...
error#7 SMTP MAILCONNECT failed
MAILSEND 0 attachments
MAILSEND 1 attachments
error#8 SMTP MAILSEND failed
disconnect from SMTP server (if MAILCONNECT) successed
error#9 SMTP MAILDISCONNECT failed
on AS400 we turn the job to MSGW in case of any error
Only if logical name ENVIRONMENT = P (production) we put job to MSGW
on PC we distinct between Application server and regular client
